attributes.additional_details:
Maria Miller's "apology" for obstructing the investigation into her expenses is totally inadeqate.

In any othe job she would have been rightly instantly fired for fiddling her expenses. But the Members of Parliament have once again looked after their own and she escaped with having to repay a small fraction of the money that an independant investigation found she had over claimed.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Parliamentary authorities.
